nodes.text: Tarnahok was a male Bith Chief Engineer of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY he was stationed in Section X on Belsavis, where Republic Strategic Information Service agent Bren send him to assist a Republic individual with recovering an HK-51 series assassin droid from the wreckage of the Fatality.
Tarnahok appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Republic quest "The Fatality" in Section X.
